TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CompressionMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether to compress or decompress the underlying stream.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used with the <xref:System.IO.Compression.GZipStream> and <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> classes.
## Examples The following code example uses the CompressionMode enumeration with the <xref:System.IO.Compression.GZipStream> class to compress and decompress a file.
[!code-cs[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.io.compression._5_1.cs)] [!code-vb[IO.Compression.GZip1#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.io.compression._5_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Compression.CompressionMode Compress = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.IO.Compression.CompressionMode Decompress = int32(0)
